title: WBB's Brozak on Biotech Picks: CEMP, TTOO, OMER (Audio)
itunes:title: WBB's Brozak on Biotech Picks: CEMP, TTOO, OMER (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Steve Brozak, President of WBB Securities, with a look at biotech stocks, and his current investment recommendations.
